Matrix A = 
[[1, 2, 3]]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SVD method:

I.1:  A+ =
[[0.0714285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143];
 [ 0.214285714285714]]

I.2:  (A+)+ [== A] =
[[1, 2, 3]]


II.1:  A * A+ * A [== A] = 
[[1, 2, 3]]

II.2:  A+ * A * A+ [== A+] = 
[[0.0714285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143];
 [ 0.214285714285714]]


III.1  A * A+ = 
[[1]]

III.2  (A * A+)^T [== A * A+] = 
[[1]]


IV.1  A+ * A = 
[[0.0714285714285714,  0.142857142857143,  0.214285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143,  0.285714285714286,  0.428571428571429];
 [ 0.214285714285714,  0.428571428571429,  0.642857142857143]]

IV.2  (A+ * A)^T [== A+ * A] = 
[[0.0714285714285714,  0.142857142857143,  0.214285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143,  0.285714285714286,  0.428571428571429];
 [ 0.214285714285714,  0.428571428571429,  0.642857142857143]]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Greville method:

I.1:  A+ =
[[0.0714285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143];
 [ 0.214285714285714]]

I.2:  (A+)+ [== A] =
[[1, 2, 3]]


II.1:  A * A+ * A [== A] = 
[[1, 2, 3]]

II.2:  A+ * A * A+ [== A+] = 
[[0.0714285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143];
 [ 0.214285714285714]]


III.1  A * A+ = 
[[1]]

III.2  (A * A+)^T [== A * A+] = 
[[1]]


IV.1  A+ * A = 
[[0.0714285714285714,  0.142857142857143,  0.214285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143,  0.285714285714286,  0.428571428571429];
 [ 0.214285714285714,  0.428571428571429,  0.642857142857143]]

IV.2  (A+ * A)^T [== A+ * A] = 
[[0.0714285714285714,  0.142857142857143,  0.214285714285714];
 [ 0.142857142857143,  0.285714285714286,  0.428571428571429];
